website_summaries.verdict: Ideal as a post-exercise humidifier – easy to store in gym bag. Fan is also powerful enough to clear away cigarette smoke.
pros: Creates a light mist for humidifying and cooling air, not heavy moisture
Good for baby strollers and car trips
cons: Bulky, not easy to carry in hand
Charging system has quality control issues

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Was super excited for this as it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Was super excited for this as it was on sale and would be perfect for my pugs on long hikes. Reason it is terrible? It leaks, but not out of anywhere, out of the USB input for charging! Pretty sure that’s a safety hazard. It made a huge mess on my desk and was right next to other electronics...
customer_reviews.author: Shanny

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, gift it. It's great
customer_reviews.text: I’m in bed, and this fan is standing on a chair working just like a real fan would! Saved me because it's too hot to sleep tonight. But I bought this to study at my college library, and it was great. Low speed didn't blow any papers away, was refreshing, and the noise didn't distract me. Unsure how it works on places like Las Vegas or Texas where it gets scorching, but it's been great here in California. Now I'm thinking of buying some for my family in Brazil. Unsure how long the battery last. I'll update this post in a couple months or so.
customer_reviews.author: R M

customer_reviews.title: Not good in hot weather
customer_reviews.text: I went to Las Vegas and the Grand Canyon. When the heat is extreme (110° - 115°F) and you really need to cool off, all the fan does is blow hot air at you. The misting doesn't help to cool art all. Useless fan.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not solid built
customer_reviews.text: It worked great when it "works". Within a week it started a rattling sound when switched on. Otherwise it's a great product. I could have fine some more research before buying this. UPDATE: Customer support is good. They sent me a new one without charging me for that. Its good, no sound so far. Seems to be working well. However when filled with water it leaks slightly from somewhere I am unable to detect. Noticed that when I wrapped in a towel. I still wanna give it a shot for few more days. Stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: Pratyay B.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought a blue for my older son years ago and its still works. Thats why i decided to buy another for my younger son (a green one), so they would each have their own. However, sadly before the summer even started it stopped working... less then 3 months it stopped working. It doesnt charge or turn on. I wouldn’t recommend getting another one. I guess i got lucky with the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Cool off quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great personal fan. I use this on the table beside my chair in summer. I love that it recharges via USB, so no battery waste in the landfill. The mist feature really works, noticeably cooling the air without getting you wet. The water container has shown no sign of leaking, even tossed around in my purse. It also has substantial air movement for its size. The fan looks as if it would be top heavy and easily knocked over - it is not. It's quite sturdy, and has a small footprint. The only downside to this great little fan is tat is not as quiet as I'd like. I use a quieter fan for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: mrsv

customer_reviews.title: Love! Keeps me cool.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second one I love it so much. You can use it dry or wet w mist. I take mine to church. To Any outdoor function. Great for travel. Charges w USP port.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleC

customer_reviews.title: Nice tabletop or desktop fan.
customer_reviews.text: Like that this comes with a stand and has 5 speeds. Rechargeable battery with lights that let you know when it is getting low charge. For people who need to sleep with fan noise, there is noise long the higher speeds so I really feel you could travel with this and not have to take a larger fan along. Just set it on bedside table. Plus if you you need moving air this will get the job done. Also will run while plugged in charging. Use it next to chair in my great room if needed when AC is not running and I just need a little air flow. Also use in bathroom while putting on makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who knew they had rechargeable misting fans?!
customer_reviews.text: If you're traveling to a super hot destination or theme park, this is the perfect tool! It's also rechargeable, so if you happen to have an external battery charger, all you have to do is plug it in if the battery gets too weak. This is definitely like having a phone though-- you have to charge it every day after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Zernette Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little fan
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little fan with multiple speeds. Use it for about 8 hours on second setting on my desk and it last all night. Charge and repeat next night. It’s lightweight very portable. Fan runs smooth and quiet for its size yet pushes plenty of air. If you run it connected to a battery back up, you can run it hard and never lose the charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jose C.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product is not what is advertised, the mist barely comes out and the fan needs to be so close to your face to even feel it. I bought a $2 plastic small fan that blows harder than this. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Lanning

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Truly great product!
customer_reviews.text: Wife found this on Amazon and ordered it. . .we were both so impressed, we ordered two more for friends! It gives you several speed choices for your varying needs, and though small, will move air comfortably in a small room on the highest speed. Rechargeable and portable. . .great price. . .can't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: whitetrashy

customer_reviews.title: If you buy this product,  you will return it
customer_reviews.text: These fans don't work. The mist is almost non-existent. I decided to buy these fans during the hottest part of the summer. My daughter was pregnant and seemed to be hot all the time. I also had a friend who worked outside at the golf course, so I thought they would be a nice gift. My daughter tried hers and laughed! The $6 must fan she had bought at Walmart blew out it off the water. Unfortunately, this was my first order from amazon and I didn't return them on time and they're still sitting packaged in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Handheld fan pretty good, great air
customer_reviews.text: A little heavier than I thought it would be. Works well, but charge runs down fairly quickly if you use it a lot. Great feature, though, is lighted indicator on the side of battery life. It also has a USB port for charging or keeping plugged in electronically. Best feature for iutside or on theme deck--a chamber for water which allows misting!! Just a little noisy. Unlike a lot of items today, this has a sturdy box with diagrams of each part. Also comes with an instruction manual.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Furr

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me. It blew no air! I returned it and purchased a different brand which was cheaper and actually works WAY better.
customer_reviews.author: C22

customer_reviews.title: very weak stream of air
customer_reviews.text: Very weak stream of air - you have to hold it almost up to your nose. But then I guess I shouldn't have expected more out of something so small and light!
customer_reviews.author: linda mathis

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Well packed. Works awesome! Great quality for price. We ordered two of these.
customer_reviews.author: ~Love2BMom

customer_reviews.title: Could use a bit more power
customer_reviews.text: I like this fan but it could use more power. I would think that for the size it would create a bit more of a breeze. The misting part really doesn’t add much. Unless you carry a large purse the fan will not fit in purse. It isn’t something I would carry with me at all times but more of a planned item I take along when I think I will need it.
customer_reviews.author: missqueenie

customer_reviews.title: The best rechargeable fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this van it is so useful I took it on a trip to Mexico for my seven-month-old baby to put in her stroller the van has small enough opening so that she could not get her fingers inside and get them cut the Mr. was light enough that it didn't bother her to be spraying an awesome thing and I especially love how it's rechargeable
customer_reviews.author: sierra

customer_reviews.title: Keep your cool
customer_reviews.text: I was the talk of the cruise with my misting fan. It is small and light weight enough to tuck away in my bag and makes such a difference in cooling me down when I need just a little breeze. It's not noisy, the mist is cooling, doesn't get you all wet. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: cutrang

customer_reviews.title: Love this little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gadget. I live in the south and being outside during the hot humid summers is sometimes unbearable. I bought this for when I go to my granddaughter's softball tournaments. It gave enough relief when sitting out in the heat all day. It is chargeable by usb which I love. I used it from 9:00 in the morning until 8:30 in the evening and it did not die. I am going to buy another for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Bama

customer_reviews.title: Super cool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as she is out in the West Texas heat a lot for her children's sports. She absolutely loves it! She wants 3 more for each of her kids. :) So simple to use, but powerful and does the job. Great invention!
customer_reviews.author: rosiemom56

customer_reviews.title: not much mist or power behind the fan
customer_reviews.text: You can hardly feel the air when the fan is inches away from your face. This was not expensive, but if I knew what I was going to be getting I would have chosen a different product. It is a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I love this fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan! I had been getting the small fans at Walmart, which are cheap but they just don't last. This one is rechargeable and has mist! It was a very good buy and I think it will last a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad. He has COPD and has panic attacks on top of it. He has this by his bed and uses it whenever he feels the need. Very sturdy works great. Came with a usb cord and had an adapter to plug into the wall. It's much bigger than I thought it would be not like a toy. I highly recommend it to anyone who needs a fan with a kick.
customer_reviews.author: Jack93

customer_reviews.title: I don't use the mister much because I wear glasses but ordered one for a friend too and she loves the cool mist.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding for outdoor concerts in the Summer! Hold charge very well. I don't use the mister much because I wear glasses but ordered one for a friend too and she loves the cool mist.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Really made a difference. The only thing is that it’s a bit bulky but was definitely worth it. Kept us cool during our travel to hawaii
customer_reviews.author: Kate Ryasati

customer_reviews.title: Cooling Spray is not that effective
customer_reviews.text: While the fan works good, the battery life is good, the cool spray is too weak to feel effective cooling.
customer_reviews.author: HealthGuru

customer_reviews.title: Awful on power
customer_reviews.text: Awful on power. Barely blows. Nowhere near powerful enough. Am returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: EasyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this little fan, blows cooler and harder than the other little ones I purchased. Made our visit to Animal Kingdom in July almost bearable.
customer_reviews.author: GrammyK

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product. I bought it before I went to Crystal Beach TX for the weekend. We ended up having a huge storm and no power for 8 hrs the second night. This fan ran nonstop all night on a single charge. It was still running 8 hours later when I turned it off.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Butler

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best fan you will ever own. I use mine in church it is that quiet. You won’t regret this purchase at all
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Davies

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive!
customer_reviews.text: I need this for summer. When I opened the package, somewhat surprised how attractive this product is! I was so excited that I used it all day. I will buy one for my niece as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: vivien serquina

customer_reviews.title: A top List of the Summer
customer_reviews.text: I bought one similar like this from a local market but it didnt spray evenly. This one sprays perfectly and easy to hold on, it's a must you need in this hot summer!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is sooo goood. I hardly need to charge it. Few years later and it’s still working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bao Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Fantastic Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter to use during sorority rush at University of Alabama. Did a great job keeping her cool between parties in the scorching Alabama heat. I lost the water plug to one of the three fans I bought. When I contacted customer service to see about getting a new plug, they quickly responded by replacing the entire fan!!! I was blown away by the quick and concerned customer service team. I will definitely buy more products from iEGrow!
customer_reviews.author: RealGeniusii

customer_reviews.title: This product is AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AWESOME!!!! Just get it..you will love it. It has several modes, the mister mode is very very fine...like a cloud..it is amazing. The fan is very quiet. Thank you iEGrow for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: This fan is great. Provides a nice gentle breeze which does not ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan is great. Provides a nice gentle breeze which does not disturb the person sitting next to you, is very, very, quiet and the misting feature is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: photo guy

customer_reviews.title: You need this for all the hot summer days we are having.
customer_reviews.text: This works great during the hot summer days. I have used this so many times during the hot days. It does last long enough for me and just recharge when I get home or in my car. I do wish the water reservoir was a little bigger, but no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Gokou

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: This portable fan is lightweight and works great! My husband suffers from migraines and overheating can bring on a headache. I highly recommend this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Birthday Girl

customer_reviews.title: Every time I break this bad boy out
customer_reviews.text: Just being real....I'm in menopause and my hot flashes kick my ass. I bring this fan with me everywhere. Every time I break this bad boy out, someone wants to know where I got it...I have ordered 10 of these for different people in my life. Even my biker husband and his brother who attend car shows in the summer love these beauties. Can say enough about how great they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: This fan was great while it lasted. It broke down after a couple weeks over the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: A WINNER !!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service!! We bought 2(one for me and the other for my husband) . One leaked and the company offered to replace/refund, but it cooled well and kept a charge so I declined. However, they sent me a code to get another one. The fans provide nice cooling and ours kept a charge well. I use mine on a table next to my TV chair to provide extra cooling to my face.Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: ginger na

customer_reviews.title: Used for Mission Trip -- Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Took it with me on a mission trip to Haiti and it was perfect. A bit larger than you may think of taking on a trip if you're going to carry it around all the time, but worth the extra hassle of carrying it to be cool. The water mist is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: taylornw

customer_reviews.title: Hand held personal fan
customer_reviews.text: Clunky to cart around but works okay if you don't mind holding this big device in front of your face
customer_reviews.author: TtaM

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend buying from this seller
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing, the product iEGrow Handheld Mini Misting looked used. I will be sending this back
customer_reviews.author: T. S.

customer_reviews.title: Cool Air
customer_reviews.text: This fan is quiet enough to not disturb the person seated next to you. It's efficient with its flow of cool air and the handle is ergonomically friendly (even a toddler can hold without dropping it).
customer_reviews.author: Dime

customer_reviews.title: Not bad considering...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't as powerful as I thought it would be considering it has a nice quality weighty feel to it but did a decent job. Came in nice box with charger.we were using it in Florida in 100 degree weather so not sure anything else would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Inman

customer_reviews.title: Hotflash buster! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: OMG. I purchased this for my friend. She loves it so much she bought one for me! I LOVE having it right next to me for hotflashes. Ladies, you can't beat it for a quick cool down!
customer_reviews.author: S Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Thrhis is perfect I took it Ito florida and universal studios fits in your purse. Charge lasts a long time. Love it it saved me from the heat and humidity
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Usb fan
customer_reviews.text: Great portable fan for walking around or doing floor workouts I take it everywhere for a small fan it's powerful
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L. Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: It is better than expected. I was impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Super light-weight and can be charged via USB
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a camping trip! It has the capability to mist you as well as fanning you! Super light-weight and can be charged via USB. It fits right into your purse!
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can not feel the mist and the fan doesn’t blow very hard with only one speed!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Grilli

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Got me through labor and I use ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Got me through labor and I use it practically every day when I need to quickly cook off!
customer_reviews.author: Jody Y.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: This is a little bigger than I would like. Also the mister doesn't seem to mist heavily and the water compartment is very small and doesn't last very long. I do like that it is chargeable.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing. I have a neuromuscular disease and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I have a neuromuscular disease and it is important to stay cool. This little misting fan has saved me more than a few times!
customer_reviews.author: PNW reader

customer_reviews.title: Battery operated
customer_reviews.text: I love the output of air. It is great when you are sitting in a car waiting for someone.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I don't leave home without this fan! It help ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave home without this fan! It help with my hot flashes. I get compliment all the time. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Glori4u

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The mist is what makes it a good product.
customer_reviews.author: john westfall

customer_reviews.title: you can see the mist come out, but not ...
customer_reviews.text: you can see the mist come out, but not feel it at all. Very weak and worthless for intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Jenaleef

customer_reviews.title: Hot in the sun during the summer track and field events!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Worked for me during track and field season!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and works for a bit. Good for indoors. Very small effect hence the good for indoors at a desk or by the bed. Stoppes working after I brought it out about a year later. No mist just fan only if plugged in
customer_reviews.author: Kyo

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonders
customer_reviews.text: We carried this during our travel to Asia, worked great and our kid had a great sleep and great travel. We loved it, Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Swami

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cure for my hot flashes
customer_reviews.text: This little fan is perfect for me. Powerful and compact. Charge last for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Moore-Read

customer_reviews.title: graet fan very refreshing
customer_reviews.text: This fan is great strong fan refreshing mist with a fine mist that keeps me dry and and the battery last up to 8 hours on a full charge and I will be planning on using it on my trip to flordia thus June.
customer_reviews.author: Nick V

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mister for my dog to use on our vacation (we rode on a motorcycle with her in a special carrier). At first she was afraid of it, but the hotter it got, the quicker she got over her fears. It worked great, only one day when it was super hot did I even have to refill it. Charging it was easy, I really think we made a good choice with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey R.

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough, good for kid-sized hands.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well enough. Uses very little water- a very fine mist, and you have to have it very close to feel it. I do like that there are no batteries to replace and the handle size was perfect for my 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Mez6B

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me cool in 112+degree heat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product . If you have ever considered a handheld fan this is the best. It is visually lovely. Great gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: juliettedarnellashdown

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Had fan alittle over month and it stopped misting. Too late to return
customer_reviews.author: punki

customer_reviews.title: it didn't really cool to my satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: It's a toy. A mere novelty. It wasn't what I expected and used outside, it didn't really cool to my satisfaction. The battery however, lasted longer than it was supposed to have. I think that used used indoors and fairly up close to your face, it may work better.
customer_reviews.author: John Choma

customer_reviews.title: This worked great for the Texas heat with a newborn on a ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for the Texas heat with a newborn on a stroller! The battery life does well also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job moving the air and it's quiet.
customer_reviews.text: The misting function is neat. It should work great in places like Arizona where the humidity is low. The fan puts out quite a bit of air quietly.
customer_reviews.author: grantjl47

customer_reviews.title: I did not like it
customer_reviews.text: When I got it I filled it up with water and the water leaked out it worked but leaked made a mess when I set it down
customer_reviews.author: DrDavis

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Keep next to my bed for hot ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Keep next to my bed for hot flashes. I don't use the water reservoir. Takes up very little room on the end table.
customer_reviews.author: retha

customer_reviews.title: Not for Arizona!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe in another state this would work but Arizona is not the state for this! Water evaporates before it gets to you even when holding it very close.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Kuczyk

customer_reviews.title: No batteries needed!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is great, the best part is that it doesn't require batteries, just charge it with a USB cable that it comes with and you're ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: L. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: This product is very cheap. I can barely feel ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is very cheap. I can barely feel any wind when I turn it on. Wanted to return it but returning process is too much hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Danger!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take on a trip to Florida in June, so we were really counting on it. 1st time we plugged it in to charge, the chord melted...VERY DANGEROUS. would not recommend! Would give ZERO star rating, if allowed to proceed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: works great for a little fan
customer_reviews.text: works great for a little fan, blows pretty good. kept us cool at the race track in the hot sun all day.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting charge!
customer_reviews.text: My fan arrived already charged, I have had it on my desk at work for 3 weeks now & it is still going off the original charge.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Amey

customer_reviews.title: Very COOL!
customer_reviews.text: We use this at my son’s baseball games and it’s just perfect. Nice mist and keeps us cool on these hot days.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great Service & Great Procduct
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on 07/21/17. The USB wire was not working properly. I contacted the IEGrow customer department and they took care of my problem right away. This is an excellent product for everyone to carry with them when the weather is so hot outside, and you have to wait on a long line to get your tickets. Tks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No mist.
customer_reviews.text: This barely sprayed out any mist. I would love to just return it. Virtually useless.
customer_reviews.author: 2 under 1

customer_reviews.title: ... row needed a bit more air - this is perfect and looks modern and
customer_reviews.text: My third row needed a bit more air - this is perfect and looks modern and sleek
customer_reviews.author: Lale M

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, and light
customer_reviews.text: My husband actually uses this for racing snd loves it, I will mow be ordering mine in pink for the beach ♡
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: I returned it
customer_reviews.text: I found it heavy to hold all day. The cheap one will meet my needs better and I sure will not be concerned about breaking it. Also, the mist was so fine, it was worthless for cooling and it had an annoying drip.I returned.
customer_reviews.author: ink-spot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little fan, enjoying the misting feature quite a bit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great i was in Egypt for 2weeks in 120degree weather this saved my life!!

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little fan, I love the water feature.

customer_reviews.title: Not great

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool product, the misting feature doest work so well but I still like it.

customer_reviews.title: Everywhere I go people ask me where I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the power of this fan! It’s amazing! Very easy to carry in my purse and use when needed!
customer_reviews.author: Lorna d Lumpkins

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Concept is great but neigther the fan nor the mist is strong enough to be very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Pam in Salem

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The water mist a nice feature on a hot day. Works well. Fan could be a bit stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the spray mist feature
customer_reviews.text: We recently had an unusual spell of hot and humid...the portable fan came in very handy. I love the spray mist feature, it reminds me of the fans in Greece during the summer. I will definitely recommend this product to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: William N

customer_reviews.title: On 100 degree Los Angeles summer, you definitely need it.
customer_reviews.text: Quality Misting Fan. Works great : D Its very light and easy to hold. The mist won't let you feel wet and uncomfortable. On 100 degree summer, you definitely need it. My 9 y.o. daughter and 3 y.o. son enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: nicole0221

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mist function doesnt cool any better under most conditions.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for a replacement..I hope!
customer_reviews.text: I think the fan I bought was defective..it worked fantastic.. for a few days.(.but it then it stopped working properly)..i just wrote to company to see if they would send me a new one..(I've had only a few weeks) (they said no returns..after I had it few weeks?.that didn't seem fair to me.).so I wrote to them..telling them mine didn't work anymore after few weeks..I will update my review..if they send me a new one..(that works properly)..maybe mine was just defective? I will let u know..what happens...
customer_reviews.author: jitz

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to refill and it keeps them cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these fans for my kids. They brought these with them to their outdoor summer camp and everyone there wished that they had one of these. The charge seems to last all day. Very easy to refill and it keeps them cool. It's light weight so not hard for kids to carry. The mist is great. It's a must have for a very hot day.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny B.
